description: Our home is close to Bed-Vyne Brew, Peaches Hothouse, Captain Dan's, Samurai Papa, Sincerely Tommy. You’ll love the studio because of its comfy bed, the architectural details and finishes, the high end bath products, the coziness. The studio is great for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. A great place to experience brownstone living with your own entrance!
name: Designers Dream Bed Stuy Studio
review: Brittney's place is a treat. Loved staying there. Easy comute to Manhattan. Clean and nice studio, it is as in the pictures. Brittney is easy to communicate with, helped us in any way she could. Would love to stay there again.
